Summary Note:
The RM met Benedetta Daniela Fabbri during a business conference in Rome. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Benedetta Daniela Fabbri is a 34 year old and comes from Italy.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Benedetta Daniela Fabbri is married to Bianchi. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2010, Benedetta finished her secondary school education at Liceo Artistico Statale Mario Sironi Sassari.
Benedetta earned her degree from IMT Institute for Advanced Studies Lucca in 2014.
Occupation History:
Benedetta Daniela Fabbri is a 34 year old Stockbroker from Italy.
At Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A., Benedetta Daniela Fabbri held the position of Stockbroker from 2014 till now, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 70000 EUR.
She owns house in Parma, where she resides. It is worth 1310000 EUR.

She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
